scope_of_work.problem: CBRE specialist (Dale Power Solutions) have identified corroded radiator hoses on Generator2. The specialist recommendation is to isolate Generator2 and replace all radiator hoses as a priority.
scope_of_work.scope: Replace all radiator hoses on Generator 2.
scope_of_work.justification: A radiator hose already failed last week causing Gen2 to be isolated until emergency repairs were completed. All radiator hoses are now recommended for replacement.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Increased risk of losing availability of Generator 2.

scope_of_work.scope:
1. Recover remaining charge from system 4A2
2. Install repair kit to system 4A2 economiser valve.
3. Pressure leak test with OFN (overnight evacuation).
4. Recover charge from system 2B2 (awaiting compressor repairs).
5. Recharge system 4A2 with charge recovered from system 2B2.
6. Restart system 4A2 and check for correct operation.
7. Digital Service Report to be issued on completion of the work order.
scope_of_work.justification: Chiller system 4A2 is unavailable until the Economiser Valve is repaired.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Continued unavailability of Chiller 4A2 and subsequent reduction to site Chiller resilience.

scope_of_work.problem: Erratic, inefficient operation of Ph1 Chiller 3. Not able to achieve stable operation at set point 9 degC
scope_of_work.scope: Replace Chiller 3 Universal Communication Module (Translator) and swap Unit and Compressor PLC to facilitate use of spare input to rectify erratic operation of chiller for meeting 9 degree C set point
scope_of_work.justification: In order to achieve reliable, stable, energy efficient Chiller operation
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Erratic operation of Chiller 3 when duty chiller, substantial loading and off-loading when it should not

project_name: UPM-HZ Install water heaters and showers

1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value

scope_of_work.problem: There are 2no water heaters on site and both have failed. The contractor has carried out investigation and reported that these unit are beyond economical repairs. This now means that there is no running domestic hot water on site.
scope_of_work.scope:
Isolate, cap back service and strip out old gas fired water heaters, All connection
Remove existing thermostatic shower from Male and Female WCs. 
Supply and install new 3Kw Heatrae Sadia water heaters to serve the following areas -
Ground Floor Kitchen
Disabled WC
Male and female ground floor WCs
Male and female first WCs
2no cleaner sinks
Supply and install 2no 8Kw electric showers to the ground floor male and female toilets, Electric showers to be Mira Advanced with TMV3.
scope_of_work.justification: there would be no running domestic hot water

3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: The 4x NHB DRUPS bulk fuel tanks have been identified as requiring manned-entry cleaning and fuel polishing to restore the diesel to industry standards.
scope_of_work.scope:
x4:

Provide temporary 30000L diesel tank and connect to DRUPS.
Remove all recoverable fuel from DRUPS bulk tank into temporary storage. 
Remove all unrecoverable fuel from DRUPS bulk tank and dispose of from site. 
Clean DRUPS bulk tank via manned entry. 
Blend recoverable fuel with Enzyme Energy to prevent microbial growth.
Filter recoverable fuel back into DRUPS bulk tank via 1 micron filters.
Replace DRUPS bulk tank desiccant breathers.
scope_of_work.justification: The fuel within the DRUPS bulk tanks has deteriorated to the point where correct operation of the DRUPS diesel engines is at risk.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Possible failure of the DRUPS and subsequent risk to the DC IT Load.
